subject: Australia's Cyber Security Strategy: Enabling innovation, growth & prosperity (2016)
document(english): 23. 6. 30. 오후 1:54 Cyber security strategy 1/2 Cyber security is important for Australia's national security, innovation, and prosperity. Last updated: Cyber security 2023-2030 Australian Cyber Security Strategy On 8 December 2022, the Minister for Cyber Security, the Hon. Clare O’Neil MP, announced the development of the 2023-2030 Australian Cyber Security Strategy . (/about-us/our-portfolios/cyber-security/strategy/2023-2030-australian-cyber-security-strategy) Australia’s Cyber Security Strategy 2020 On 6 August 2020, Australia’s Cyber Security Strategy 2020 was released. (/about-us/our-portfolios/cyber-security/strategy/australias-cyber-security-strategy-2020) Ransomware Action Plan On 13 October 2021, the Ransomware Action Plan was announced. (/about-us/our-portfolios/cyber-security/strategy/australias-ransomware-action-plan) Streng thening Australia’s cyber security regulations and incentives On 13 July 2021, consultation opened on options for regulatory reforms and voluntary incentives. (/about-us/our-portfolios/cyber-security/strategy/strengthening-australias-cyber-security-regulations-and-incentives) Strategy Ask a question 23. 6. 30. 오후 1:54 Cyber security strategy 2/2 27 February 2023
